desc: First beta release
Add recipe scripts
Add skill limit to most mod items, add item physics and other mods that makes game harder
Add skill limit to items that missed
First stable release
Add progressive boss mod to make vanilla boss harder.
Removed body temperature since it makes game nearly unplayable.
Lycanite mob rare subspecies no longer display boss hp bar by default and will despawn.
Lycanite mob event now respect light level, add sulfur dust furnace recipe.
Disabled AquaCulture's fish weight so it's possible to making automatic crafting system.
Mob spawner will spawn much more mobs now (farming possible)
Add more mods, including modular series, thaum craft series, industrial foregoing, mekanism, elevator, etc.
Add skill restrictions to new items.
Add EnderIO seris and skill restrictions to most of items.
Remove duplicated ore veins
Add immersive railroading and relative dependencies
Removed DragonMounts2 due to massive lag/crash/error and discounted; added HarvestCraft. Harvest now gives 2xp but harvest&plant now must use tools
Sleeping/Fishing/Tree-Chopping no longer spawn mobs, add BetterFPS
Disable HarvestCraft's fishing pool since it'll overwrite AquaCulture's
Removed HarvestCraft due to incompatibility with AquaCulture, add skill restriction to thermal's upgrades and lower ic2 tank's requirement. Stablized modpack content.
Identified AuqalCulture's fishes can only be obtained via the fishing rod from its mod, not HarvestCraft's fault so added it back. Twilight Forest now will spawn fruit trees.
Railcraft's tanks now holding 25% more fluid, portable tank from ThermalExpansion holds 75% less fluid.
Removed BetterFPS due to incompatible with ModernWarfare (guns unable to shoot). Right-click simple harvest is back and hopefully will gives XP. Now allow drinking from rail.
Activly disabled better survival's spears due to potential crash bugs
Most of nether mobs from lycanitesmobs will respect light level now
Update mods to latest version, add NotEnoughIDs
Update most mods to latest version, add Cooking for blockhead, Tinker's Armor and leveling
Add serveral handy mods including wireless crafting terminal, upper, klee slabs etc.
Pre-release of latest modpack, update mods to latest and add several new mods including: FlansMod(very unstable!), Enviromental Tech, Action Additions, Hatchery, AppleSkin, Xnet etc.
